document_data.name: Handcandle
document_data.mainbody: '''''Handcandle''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that allowed a caster to conjure a red or white flame within their hand.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell manifested one of two types of light within the [[cleric]]'s open palm. The red flame was incendiary and damaging, in a manner similar to the spell ''[[produce flame]]''. The white flame was non-harmful and often used to simply illuminate a given area.

Neither of the ''handcandle'' flames could be extinguished by strong gusts of air, even if they were magical in nature.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell could be revealed upon a surface by the [[Oghma]]n [[relic]], the ''[[Key of Faith]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
